short.am,ar,bg,bn,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Share links with Zorin Connect, direct to the browser or by SMS.
short.ca: Compartiu enllaços amb el Zorin Connect, directament al navegador o mitjançant SMS.
short.cs: Sdílet odkazy pomocí Zorin Connect, přímo do prohlížeče nebo prostřednictvím SMS.
short.da: Dele links med Zorin Connect, direkte til browseren eller via SMS.
short.de: Teilen Sie Links mit Zorin Connect, direkt mit dem Browser oder per SMS.
short.es: Comparta enlaces con Zorin Connect, directamente al navegador o a través de SMS.
short.et: Jaga linke Zorin Connect, otse brauserisse või SMSi teel.
short.fr: Partagez des liens avec Zorin Connect, directement vers le navigateur ou par SMS.
short.it: Condividi collegamenti con Zorin Connect, direttamente nel browser o via SMS.
short.lt: Bendrinti nuorodas, naudojant Zorin Connect, tiesiogiai į naršyklę ar per SMS žinutę.
short.pl: Udostępnianie odnośników za pomocą Zorin Connect, bezpośrednio do przeglądarki lub przez wiadomość SMS.
short.ru: Отправлять ссылки в веб браузер или по SMS.
short.sk: Zdieľanie odkazov s aplikáciou Zorin Connect, priamo cez prehliadač alebo formou SMS.
short.sr: Дели везе Zorin Connect, директно у преглдач или путем СМС-а.
short.tr: Zorin Connect ile bağlantıları doğrudan tarayıcı veya SMS ile paylaş.
short.uk: Поширюйте посилання за допомогою Zorin Connect, напряму до браузера або через SMS.

long.ar,ca,da,uk:
A browser extension for sharing links with phones, tablets and other devices connected with the Zorin Connect GNOME Shell extension.

Share links to websites, images and videos, either directly to the device browser or by SMS.

This extension is an open source project based on the GSConnect web extension.
long.am,bg,bn,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,:
A browser extension for sharing links with phones, tablets and other devices connected with the Zorin Connect GNOME Shell extension.

Share links to websites, images and videos, either directly to the device browser or by SMS.

Please note you will need to have Zorin OS 15 or newer installed on your computer and enable Zorin Connect on the desktop for this extension to work.

This extension is an open source project based on the GSConnect web extension.
long.cs,de,es,et,fr,hu,it,lt,pl,ru,sk,sr,tr:
A browser extension for sharing links with phones, tablets and other devices connected with the Zorin Connect GNOME Shell extension.

Share links to websites, images and videos, either directly to the device browser or by SMS.
